[robotpy]
run = wpilib._impl.start:Main

wpilib_core = wpilib.pkgcfg
wpilibc = wpilib._impl.pkgcfg
wpilibc_counter = wpilib.counter.pkgcfg
wpilibc_drive = wpilib.drive.pkgcfg

wpilibc_interfaces = wpilib.interfaces.pkgcfg
